meta.description: The Grand Lounge Elite at Mexico City International Airport (MEX), Terminal 1. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

general: Flying Blue Platinum, Club 2000, and Skyteam Elite Plus members, as well as Visa Infinite cardholders (issued in Mexico) and La Premiere Class passengers can access "Salon Frida" within the lounge, which includes additional amenities and benefits.

reviews.content: It is a crowded, windowless "bunker". They direct you to a seat as most of them are "reserved". Felt unwelcome from the beginning. I left after 1 minute without any consumption. Never again!
Was woken every three hours to re-check in. Even though they had my card on file.
Lounge is decent. Not the best, but it’s OK. Service is good.
Everything was great except for the high pitched chirp every 45 seconds of a smoke detector needing its battery changed.
We got into this lounge and were treated very well! Food and service were excellent. Arron did a great job accommodating us!!
Awesome stuff and great service. Food is fresh, alcohol drinks are free. They also provide nail and message services, tried hand message and it was decent.
Very good with service! Not many people on Saturday noon. Like it!

Way too many staff makes it incredibly annoying. They direct you where to sit because half the seating is reserved. The complimentary 10 min massage was nice but not worth the annoyance of the lounge.
Staff were amazing and helpful. Shower was pleasant and convenient. Food was interesting.
The food bar is meh and cold. The table service food is hot but not good. There were plenty of available recliners but they made me sit at the bar due to reservations/lack of space.
Confusing. There are reclining armchairs and semi-enclosed rooms but you need a reservation, and you have to reserve through a web form more than 5 hours in advance. Finally they took pity on me.
Pretty busy. Good coffee. Real meals can be ordered off a menu (order two, they're small). Bartender was totally ignoring people while using his phone.
Fresh, made to order entree offered and the bar staff was friendly and attentive but snack offering was very limited/basic. Comfortable chairs but not enough power outlets (for every seat).
It’s a nice looking lounge, with a lot of service, with surprisingly little on offer. No black, or green tea, or dry sparkling wine. I was unimpressed.
Pretty decent. Went here because the other reviews were better for here than other lounges in MEX. was a good place to kill some time. Nice touch having an actual coffee bar.
Excellent service, comfortable chairs, nice shower, strong selection of food/beverage. Would visit again!
Crowded but lovely. Very comfortable, attractive, and very friendly service.
Crowded, but excellent and personal service.
Excellent service, a bit crowded but it’s the best spot in the entire airport.
This is a good lounge. It’s not pretty at all. But it has everything you need plus reclining chairs. Also the service is really good and they’re very attentive.
Got sick eating snacks that were spoiled. Never again!
Top service. Very friendly & attentive. Comfortable recliners. Limited space.

Life saver!! We were stranded in the airport at 2am. Food, water, blankets...Reclining chairs for sleeping is heaven. And the calm, reassuring service team changed everything. And a ride to the gate!!

The awful physical ambience takes away whatever good comes from the nice staff or food (not much was available around 5am on a Monday). Desperately needs a remodel and maybe an adjustment to the music.
The service is truly good and the food selection is also awesome. Most impressive.
Great lounge with showers, made to order food, an excellent cappuccino and all served by a very friendly and attentive staff.
Incredible service and hospitality. Not a great selection of food but the drinks are free flowing and the service warm and impeccable. Free shoe cleaning and showers.
Stopped in for breakfast. Had a nice made to order omelette and a great cappuccino.
Not too big and quite busy at 9am. Awesome service!
Most helpful attentive friendly service. Outstanding customer care. Full menu and good alcohol selection. Smaller lounge and not up to date but everything else makes up for it. I'll be back! Thanks!
This was my first visit, won't be my last! Friendly staff, great food, clean lounge & shower! I used my Priority Club pass.
Jessica and Veronica and the rest of the staff were very friendly and helpful. The people here make the difference. I had juice and coffee and continental breakfast. My son had waffles.
Lounge is smaller although there was adequate seating.  Complimentary food options are mainly fruits, breads and muffins. Free waffle was tiny. Alcohol selection decent. Service was terrific.
Everything is great. Plates are a little small. You get more food with eggs over waffles.
Nice service. Comfortable but not luxurious.
Clean lounge with lots of seating and charging stations. Friendly, helpful staff and lots of food/drink options.
Great lounge, real meals for free, travel and visit lounges all the time and probably the best.
Lounge is on the smaller side but has good seating and a nice selection of food and drinks. It is the best lounge on T1.
Buen servicio, el lugar es agradable, la comida está ok.
Great kick back lounge chairs and a nice breakfast. Takes Priority Pass Select.
Great service and friendly staff, overall great ambience.
Great service, super friendly staff.
Garish lime green, orange and white decor. Attentive service and good but not great food.
Best lounge for Priority Pass. Great made to order food, amazing service.  Better than the Platinum Lounge.
This is the only lounge that offers free food/meals, along with free drinks (any kind). Remember to tip the person attending you. Downside is they don't have screens with the flights.
A little old and not the best ambience but attentive service.
A bit crowded and ok food/drink options, BUT they let me in with my Lounge Club membership AND they let me bring in a guest when only paying for one person, so...

otherLounges.name: Terraza by The Grand Lounge Elite

location.terminalDirections: After security at entrance G, proceed through Duty Free and take the escalators down to Boarding Zone H. The lounge is located on the left hand side, near Gate 19.

otherLounges.name: The Lounge Mexico by Global Lounge Network

location.terminalDirections: After Security Checks, pass through entrance J and the Duty Free. The lounge is located next to Gate 31.
After security, opposite Gate 9 and to the right of Gate 1.
Domestic Departure Area, Between Gates 17 and 18.
Follow signs to "Salas VIP", near Gate 19, located on the 2nd level.
Near Gate 19. When approaching the gate, turn right, walk past the first lounge, and turn right again. Follow the hallway to the end, turn right, and then take the elevator to the lounge.
Pre-Security of international Terminal 1, between Gate 8 and F1, next to the Urban Corner restaurant.
